DOC.brief_summary: This explorative phase II study investigate suitability PD L 506 specific intra-operative detection breast tumour tissue .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Caucasian female postmenopausal patient Patients histologically confirm primary palpable nonpalpable breast cancer size 5 cm ( T1 T2 ) Suspicious lymphogenic metastasis ( cN13 ) Acute chronic hepatic disease Manifest renal disease renal dysfunction Relevant cardiac disease Preceding therapy breast tumour investigation Patients multiple attempt hookwire placement preparation surgery Dementia psychic condition might interfere ability understand study thus give write informed consent Simultaneous participation another clinical study participation another clinical study 30 day directly precede treatment
